lines.text: Just remember, if you're not one up on the other fellow, then he's one up on you.
[last line. Mr S. Potter to the camera]

I do apologize ladies and gentlemen, events do seem to have taken a most unfortunate turn. This sort of calamity we cannot always guard against, even amongst our best students. You see once, once sincerity rears its ugly head, well lifemanship is powerless...
stop that music... orchestra!... orchestra... stop that infernal din. Please, no, I... look at me, I must get back to Yeovil.

[Repeated line during tennis game to Palfrey]
Hard cheese old boy!

[translating the French menu in the Camelia Room restaurant for Palfrey]
The brains of the calf, the liver of the chicken, the legs of the frog... the hoof of the mountain goat in jelly. Tomatoes...
It doesn't matter. The flow has been interrupted.
